definitions.definition: A phrase or expression peculiar to or characteristic of a given person or group of people.
examples: The television show host is widely recognized for his all-too-common locutions .

definitions.definition: The use of a word or phrase in an unusual or specialized way.
Style of discourse or usage, or any particular utterance in such style.
A supernatural revelation where a religious figure , statue or icon speaks, usually to a saint .

main_definition: A phrase or expression peculiar to or characteristic of a given person or group of people.
secondary_definitions: The use of a word or phrase in an unusual or specialized way.
Style of discourse or usage, or any particular utterance in such style.
( religion ) A supernatural revelation where a religious figure , statue or icon speaks, usually to a saint .
